#summary SPARQL Tips

= Getting things with label X =
{{{
SELECT * WHERE { ?s rdfs:label "X"@en }
}}}
= Getting things whose label contains X =
{{{
SELECT * WHERE { ?s rdfs:label ?o. ?o bif:contains "X" }
}}}
= Counting things whose label contains X =
{{{
SELECT count(*) WHERE { ?s rdfs:label ?o. ?o bif:contains "X" }
}}}
= Getting the types T of a thing X =
{{{
SELECT ?t WHERE { X rdf:type ?t}
}}}
